contentTypes.name: Special Offer Landing Page
contentTypes.description: A landing page with promotional items needing legal approval

contentTypes.name: Special Offer
contentTypes.description: The body of text used in special offers

description.en-US: Get a free Roku when you purchase a subscription to Altamont Studios TV.

content.value: For a limited-time, you’ll get a FREE Roku® Ultra ($129.99 value) when you subscribe and prepay for 2 months of Altamont Studios TV!

One per customer and cannot be combined. Must provide email address and credit card. Must pre-pay for two month(s) of service. New customers only. Limit one device per Altamont Studios account. Not available with free trial. Not available in Puerto Rico.
After two month(s), your credit card will be charged monthly for applicable subscription until you cancel your service.

Cancel on altamontstudios.com or visit help.altamontstudios.com to contact us. Programming fees are charged monthly in advance and no credits or refunds will be issued for partial or prepaid months after cancellation.
For a limited-time, you’ll get a FREE Roku® Express ($29.99 value) when you subscribe and prepay for 2 months of Altamont Studios TV!

One per customer and cannot be combined. Must provide email address and credit card. Must pre-pay for two month(s) of service. New customers only. Limit one device per Altamont Studios account. Not available with free trial. Not available in Puerto Rico.
After two month(s), your credit card will be charged monthly for applicable subscription until you cancel your service.

Cancel on altamontstudios.com or visit help.altamontstudios.com to contact us. Programming fees are charged monthly in advance and no credits or refunds will be issued for partial or prepaid months after cancellation.

roles.name: Editor
roles.description: Allows editing, publishing and archiving of content

roles.name: Freelancer
roles.description: Allows only editing of content they created themselves

roles.name: Translator
roles.description: Allows editing of localized fields in the specified language

roles.name: Legal Approver
roles.description: Used to give legal approval to some content types before publishing
